title: Body in the Suitcase: The Murder of Deborah Chong
overview: This series will explore the remarkable circumstances surrounding the disturbing case of Mee Kuen Chong, also known as Deborah Chong, who, on 11th June 2021, was murdered and decapitated by her one-time friend, Jemma Mitchell.Â With access to family, investigators, and forensic experts, Body in the Suitcase: The Murder of Deborah Chong will aim to unpick the complex motives and circumstances behind an unlikely friendship that ended in a brutal murder.
